channel.title: The OTF Clan
channel.description:
Recently, me and a couple of my friends decided to start up a clan. This clan is called "OTF". We're looking for more people to join the clan and play with us in big COD [b](let it be Advanced Warfare (AW), Black Ops 2 (BO2), Black Ops 1 (BO1), Modern Warfare 3 (MW3), I believe you get the picture :P )[/b] lobbies. This clan is mainly based upon [b]trolling, knifing, tomahawking and sniping.[/b] You have to be on [b]PS3[/b] (sorry to xbox users :( ) to join. [b]You must be good at these said things![/b] If you'd like to join, send me a message on Moparscape with your username :D From there on, we'll discuss more information about the clan.
Thanks for taking the time to read this xD

item.title: The OTF Clan
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:3, topic:551138”][quote author=naseem142 link=topic=670053.msg4480478#msg4480478 date=1429293205]
I’d like to join! But what is MSCP?
[/quote]
Hell yeah Naseem, you’re more than welcome MSCP is Moparscape
I’ve played with you enough to know you don’t need testing :)[/quote]

Okay great , changing my clan tag on my next log in

Read full topic

item.title: The OTF Clan
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Recently, me and a couple of my friends decided to start up a clan. This clan is called “OTF”. We’re looking for more people to join the clan and play with us in big COD (let it be Advanced Warfare (AW), Black Ops 2 (BO2), Black Ops 1 (BO1), Modern Warfare 3 (MW3), I believe you get the picture ) lobbies.
This clan is mainly based upon trolling, knifing, tomahawking and sniping. You have to be on PS3 (sorry to xbox users ) to join. You must be good at these said things!
If you’d like to join, send me a message on Moparscape with your username
From there on, we’ll discuss more information about the clan.

Thanks for taking the time to read this xD

Read full topic
